doc.title: Gay Cops: Pride Behind the Badge
doc.plot: This deeply moving and often funny documentary chronicles the lives, the loves, the challenges and the triumphs of lesbian and gay law enforcement officers from around the United States. Shot the week of 9/11 against an unexpectedly world-changing event (and currently used as a training tool in police academies nation-wide) GAY COPS challenges homophobic stereotypes about masculinity, gayness and heroism through personal stories of bravery and commitment, and ultimately, profound moral courage. Winner Best Documentary: Provincetown International Film Festival HBO Audience Award, Fire Island Film Festival Grand Jury Prize. (www.dakotafilmworks.com)
